We provide businesses all over the world with the quality business web hosting that they deserve. We understand that you and your customers depend on speed and reliability. This is why we give our business hosting clients a greater share of the total server resources. We do this by adding fewer business accounts on each server, resulting in faster load times, and greater reliability.

Main Web Hosting Features:
  • 99.9% Uptime Guarantee - We Guarantee your website will be online 99.9% of the time. Get a refund if uptime falls below our SLA in any month.
  • Free Migration Assistance - We copy your website and email data from the old host over to our servers, without any downtime and Free! Learn more!
  • Free Website Builder - Create a brand new website for yourself or your clients and publish online in just 15 mins.
  • One-Click Auto-Installer - Instant Script Installer featuring over 420 of today's most important web scripts. Install WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, Magento, PrestaShop, Shopping Carts, phpBB and so much more in just one click!
  • Secured Logins - Secure all login and payment pages on your hosted domains using Free SSL's.
  • Free Dedicated SSL - All accounts include Free Dedicated SSL's for all hosted domains, including addon domains.
  • Latest cPanel - Your control panel will automatically update each night so you always have the latest version. cPanel is a web-based control panel that helps you quickly and easily manage your websites and administer your hosting account. You can setup databases, email addresses, view traffic stats and more!
